article_title: Dr. Tom Fitzgerald: Rooted in patient care, and the emergency room
article_text:
Carrollton, GA (30117)

Today

A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High around 85F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph..

Tonight

Partly cloudy skies. Low 62F. Winds light and variable.

article_metadata.author: Ken Denney/Times-Georgian

og.description: A medical emergency is a highly personal drama, a time when an individual, or a family, is suddenly shaken by a crisis over which they have no control.
